div.p: To buy unique pieces is to buy a piece of the artist: His passion put in the execution of the object, his hours of reflexion, his dexterity... It is a committed, ethical act, which encourages a responsible and direct economy.
Whether it is to help you see clearly in a project, to confirm a choice or when you have no idea about the layout of your interior, our advisers are there to accompany you throughout your project.
